hero.title: Build Stunning Websites Fast with SnapSite
hero.description: SnapSite empowers you to create professional websites in minutes—no coding skills needed. Our user-friendly drag-and-drop builder, smart AI design tools, and instant deployment to Vercel make website creation a breeze. Optimize your site with built-in SEO features and launch your vision today. Try it free now!

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that's right for your business. All plans include a 14-day free trial.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our platform.

1.question: Do I need coding skills to use SnapSite?
1.answer: Nope! SnapSite’s drag-and-drop system is built for everyone—no coding required.

2.question: How does the 14-day free trial work?
2.answer: Our 14-day free trial gives you full access to all features of your selected plan. No credit card is required to sign up, and you can cancel at any time during the trial period with no obligation.

3.question: Can I change plans later?
3.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. If you upgrade, the new pricing will be prorated for the remainder of your billing cycle. If you downgrade, the new pricing will take effect at the start of your next billing cycle.

4.question: Can I connect my own domain?
4.answer: Yes, our paid plans let you use a custom domain for a fully branded site.

5.question: What’s the AI design helper like?
5.answer: It’s like having a designer on call—our AI offers suggestions for layouts, colors, and more based on your content.

6.question: Can I sell products with SnapSite?
6.answer: Definitely! The Advanced Plan includes e-commerce tools to start your online shop.

7.question: What support options are available?
7.answer: We offer email support for all users, plus priority help for Advanced Plan members, along with tutorials and a community hub.
